author: Joseph Zucker
title: MLS Considering Tournament Formats, Neutral-Site Games to Complete 2020 Season
description: Major League Soccer is contemplating multiple ways to restart and conclude the 2020 season, which has been suspended indefinitely because of the COVID-19 pandemic...
content:
Omar Vega/Getty Images
Major League Soccer is contemplating multiple ways to restart and conclude the 2020 season, which has been suspended indefinitely because of the COVID-19 pandemic.
